Title: Allows state finance authorities to place liens on federal property within the state in the event of federal noncompliance with congressionally approved spending
Summary: Allows the state comptroller and commissioner of taxation and finance to place liens on federal property within the state in the event of federal noncompliance with congressionally approved spending.
LawCode: Add ยง50-b, State L; amd ยง8, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state law and the state finance law, in relation to allowing state finance authorities to place liens on federal property within the state in the event of federal noncompliance with congressionally approved spending
